rComments: Professor Schilz is really amazing, the topics covered in her course are really interesting and keeps you engaged at every meeting. She is really good at giving feedback on your writing, and following up with you when you have questions. You have to attend class to get a good grade, but trust me, her lectures are engaging and fun.

She was an amazing professor! Very helpful, and approachable. She even adjusted the syllabus when students were having trouble keeping up during midterms. She was very understanding. She made the class challenging, but not overwhelming. Had individual and group meetings throughout the course for writing assignments, and final research paper.
